mapper.sql: id, username, `password`, open_id, nickname, photo, `name`, sex, tel, email, hiredate, `role`, root, dept_id, `status`, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_name FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_role r ON JSON_CONTAINS(u.role, CAST(r.id AS char)) JOIN tb_permission p ON JSON_CONTAINS(r.permissions, CAST(p.id AS char)) WHERE u.id=#{userId} AND u.status=1;
SELECT id FROM tb_user WHERE username = #{username} AND password = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{password}, #{username})) LIMIT 1
SELECT u.name, u.photo, d.dept_name AS deptName FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_dept d ON u.dept_id=d.id WHERE u.id=#{userId} AND u.status=1
SELECT id FROM tb_user WHERE id = #{userId} AND password = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{oldPassword}, username))
